title: 395 RP randomly added to my account. What should I do?
body: On Monday, I was sitting on 870 RP left over from a gift card. I didn't touch my account until Friday night. When I logged back on, I noticed I now have 1265 RP, meaning I somehow gained 395. No special notification that I know of came up, so what should I do? Was I hacked, was there a flaw in the system, and should I even touch my RP right now?

replies.body:
No hacks, and you're free to spend that RP fam! 

As it turns out, we launched a sale that wasn't announced 2 weeks in advance. Since it feels really bad for those who bought things right before they went on sale (without KNOWING they would be on sale) we did a retroactive refund. That 395 RP was the sales difference so you would be paying the cheaper price ^_^
